fields.name: Arsen Lupen Bar
fields.address: Istiklal cad. Ayhan Isik Sokak, Beyoglu
fields.description: Arsen Lupen is known for its friendly staff and relaxed atmosphere. This Taksim bar is a popular hangout for intellectuals and plays a range of alternative music from rock to punk, metal, indie and more.

fields.name: Karga Bar
fields.address: Kadife Sok. No: 16, Kadikoy - Asian side
fields.description: Spread over four floors in an Addams Family-esque stone mansion, Karga ('Crow') is one of the Asian side's best loved bars.

fields.name: Murphy's Dance Bar
fields.address: Setur Marina B Iskelesi Ucu, Kalamis, Fenerbahce
fields.description: Set on the Kalamis marina on Istanbul's Asian side, Murphy's Dance Bar makes the most of its spectacular location.

fields.name: Babylon
fields.address: Seyhbender Sokak 3 Tunel-Asmalimescit Tünel, Asmalimescit Istanbul 80040
fields.description: Babylon, designed as a multipurpose performance space, is the premier award-winning live music venue in Turkey, that is offering both some of Turkey's most popular artists and some very special international bands and musicians at fairly reasonable rates.

fields.name: Anjelique
fields.description: Chilled and summery, Anjelique revels in its majestic view of Bosphorus, something the mirrored interior only enhances. Though the upper floors house a pleasant dining area, in the main people come here to party.

fields.name: Biber Bar
fields.address: No 36 Harmantepe Mh., Abdi Ipekci Caddesi 3, Istanbul
fields.description: With its tasteful modern design, the re-opened Biber Bar is located in one of Istanbul’s smartest districts. The interior is sleek and contemporary with wood floors, bold wall art and a well-stocked bar; the perfect place, in fact, for an after-work drink

fields.name: Blackk
fields.description: Given the name it’s no real surprise that pretty much everything in this elegant Istanbul nightclub is black: floors, curtains, tables, seating (though there is art on the walls and pools of blue light to break up the monotony).

fields.name: Reina
fields.description: Reina is less of a club than a vast entertainment emporium that includes several bars, restaurants and dance floors that can accommodate more than 2500 people.

fields.name: Ulus 29
fields.address: Adnan Saygun Cad, Ulus Parki Ici 1, Istanbul
fields.description: Ulus 29 has become a fixture amid Istanbul's rapidly changing nightlife scene. This place is here for keeps. Blessed with a superb location on the hilltop of Ulus, the venue boasts nigh-on unbeatable views of the Bosphorus.

fields.name: Vogue
fields.address: Spor Caddesi, BJK Plaza A Blok Kat:13 Akaretler, Istanbul
fields.description: Open for over a decade now, Vogue remains one of Istanbul's coolest destinations. The view of the Bosphorous is one of its chief attractions, but far from the only one, its sushi bar is also a big draw.

fields.name: Bronx Pi Sahne
fields.description: Bronx Pi Sahne regularly hosts big local and international music acts, theatrical and dance performances, workshops and film screenings. This multi-purpose venue is part of the Kafe Pi Group.

fields.name: Dogzstar
fields.description: Opened in 2004, Dogzstar has been welcoming local and international artists, writers, musicians and music appreciators ever since. This alternative arts and music venue boasts new technical equipment, architectural and acoustic design.

fields.name: Mojo
fields.description: Hosting a wide range of jazz, blues, rock and more, Mojo Live Music Bar Istanbul has been up and running since 1997. Open Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays, entrance prices range between 10 and 25 Lira depending on the day of the week.

fields.name: Line Music Club
fields.description: Offering up a feast of live music each evening, Line Music Club in Taksim is a great place to see bands in action on weekdays when entrance is free.

fields.name: Garajistanbul
fields.address: Tomtom Mahallesi Yenicarsi Caddesi Kaymakam Resat , Galatasaray
fields.description: An open-minded, progressive collective of artists turned this old garage located on the backstreets of the Galatasaray district into a non-profit space dedicated for every kind of aesthetic manifestation.

fields.name: The Hall Istanbul
fields.description: Set inside a beautiful historic church, The Hall is Istanbul's alternative performance centre, hosting a variety of performances, parties, exhibitions, wokrshops and more.

fields.name: Haymatlos Bar and Performance Venue
fields.address: Rumeli Han C Blok, No:96 Kat:2, Istiklal Street
fields.banner: organizations/ Haymatlos Bar and Performance Venue/216061_677_450.jpg
fields.description: Haymatlos is one of Istiklal Street's best kept nightlife secrets. Tucked away down a dark passage, this large venue hosts regular rock, R&B, jazz and ethnic music concerts.

fields.name: Tamirane
fields.address: Eski Silahtaraga Elektrik Santrali, Kazim Karabekir Cad. No: 2/8 , Eyup
fields.description: Set inside an old warehouse on Istanbul's Golden Horn. Tamirane is one of the city's most unique venues.Tamirane is part of Santral Istanbul, a contemporary arts, culture and education centre which is home to a scattering of restaurants, bars and a museum

fields.name: Nu Pera
fields.description: Voted one of the World's Best Bars, Nu Pera is actually a complex of dining and entertainment venues.

fields.name: Jolly Joker Balans
fields.address: Istiklal cad. Balo Sokak 22, Istiklal Street
fields.description: This multi-storey pub hosts a range of live music acts including rock, pop, metal and indie, and DJ's also feature. This unique bar is lined with artwork and jesters. The upstairs balcony, with glass floor and seating, is popular.

fields.name: Araf Cafe Bar
fields.address: Istiklal Caddesi Balo Sokak no:32, Istiklal Street
fields.description: Araf, named after the mythical land between heaven and hell- purgatory- is a busy and popular nightlife spot favoured by Istanbul’s expat community as well as its locals.

fields.name: 360 Istanbul
fields.address: Istiklal Cad. Misir Apart. K.8 F311, Istiklal Street
fields.description: 360 Istanbul enjoys a 360 degree panoramic view of the city, the Marmara Sea, Bosphorus and the Golden Horn . This funkily-decorated glass penthouse, located on the top of a 19th century apartment block, contains a restaurant, bar and gallery.

fields.name: Sortie Nightclub
fields.description: Sortie is home to a variety of swanky restaurants serving world cuisine alongside the pumping nightclub. This popular Ortakoy nightlife venue is only open during the summer months. Sortie is open from 6pm - 4am every day.

fields.name: Sadberk Hanim Museum
fields.description: This privately owned museum is dedicated to the late wife of Vehbi Koc, the self-made founder of the Koc dynasty, one of the wealthiest families in Turkey (who are also responsible for the Rahmi Koc Museum) .

fields.name: Gallery Apel
fields.description: Established in 1998 by the former gallery director of Ankara Tanbay and Urart Art Galleries, Mrs. Nuran Terzioglu, Gallery Apel Istanbul houses a noteworthy collection of Turkish, Ottoman and international art works.

fields.name: SALT
fields.description: Opened on April 9, 2011, SALT is a not-for-profit organisation founded by Garanti Bank.Welcoming a wide range of fields including art, architecture, urbanism, design and economic and social history, SALT assembles a variety of archives for research

fields.name: Istanbul Modern - Museum of Modern Art
fields.address: Meclis-i Mebusan Cad. Antrepo No:4, Tophane
fields.banner: organizations/Istanbul Modern - Museum of Modern Art/238103_500_333.jpg
fields.description: In a city that prides itself on its history, Istanbul Modern is a refreshing alternative for those who want to see a piece of the ‘new Istanbul.’

fields.name: Dogancay Museum
fields.address: Istiklal cad. Balo Sok. no. 42, Istiklal Street
fields.description: Dogancay Museum, opened in 2004, was the first modern art museum in Turkey. It houses an extensive collection of art from father-son team Adil and Burhan Dogancay. The Museum is housed inside a 150-year old building just off Istiklal Street.

fields.name: Taksim Park
fields.description: Situated right next to Taksim Square, Taksim Park is a small city park.It's certainly not the best park in town, but it's a nice place to take a breath of fresh air in the middle of crowded Taksim. Exhibitions & concerts take place here from time to time.

fields.name: Harbiye Cemil Topuzlu Open Air Theatre
fields.banner: organizations/Harbiye Cemil Topuzlu Open Air Theatre/329595_490_308.jpg
fields.description: For a summer’s night out to remember, head to the Cemil Topuzlu Open Air Theatre, a modern take on an ancient style amphitheatre. This stunning venue with tiered seating hosts a wide variety of musical and cultural performances during the warmer months.

fields.name: Cemal Resit Rey (CRR) Concert Hall
fields.description: Cemal Resit Rey is one of the main concert halls in Istanbul with seating capacity for 850 people. Its close proximity to Taksim Square makes it a popular venue. A wide range of concerts are held here, from classical performances to Turkish folk or Blues.

fields.name: Kucukciftlik Park
fields.description: Die-hard music fans take note: this open air park situated in the very heart of the city is one of the best places to experience a gig in Istanbul.

fields.name: Turker Inanoglu Maslak(TIM) Show Centre
fields.description: Turker Inanoglu Maslak (TIM) Show Centre in Maslak offers a range of venue options including a Grand Hall seating 1810, another theatre hall with capacity for 380, five meeting rooms suitable for small meetings and workshops and five movie theatres.

fields.name: Borusan Kultur Sanat
fields.address: Orhan Adli Apaydin Sokak No:1, Istiklal Street
fields.description: Offering a multi-purpose arts space at the centre of Beyoglu, Borusan Music & Art House is located inside a beautifully restored 19th century building.

fields.name: Atatürk Cultural Centre
fields.description: Situated at the centre of all the action in Taksim Square, there are few easier and cheaper ways to get a bit of culture in Istanbul than at the Ataturk Cultural Centre (AKM).

fields.name: Turkcell Kurucesme Arena
fields.description: With some of the best live acts around and an even better view of the Bosphorus, what better way to fend off the balmy summer heat than to see a concert at the Kurucesme Arena.

fields.name: Sureyya Opera House
fields.description: Though perhaps not usually associated with Turkey, opera is nevertheless alive and well at Kadikoy’s Surreya Opera House, offering up an enchanting array of musical treats in the heart of Istanbul’s Asian side.

fields.name: IS Sanat Arts and Culture Centre
fields.banner: organizations/Is Sanat Arts and Culture Centre/210432_613_296.jpg
fields.description: Is Sanat is located inside the Isbank Towers. This beautiful venue regularly hosts classical music, jazz and traditional Turkish music performances as well as plays and poetry readings.

fields.name: Besiktas Kultur Merkezi
fields.address: Sinanpasa Mah. Hasfirin Cad. No:75     Besiktas / Istanbul
fields.description: The foremost centre for arts and culture in Istanbul, BKM was founded on the grounds of historic Mistik Theatre, in 1994, and by the initiatives of producer Necati Akpinar and actor/author Yilmaz Erdogan.

fields.name: Mask Live Music Club
fields.address: Istiklal Cad. Bekar Sok. No: 10     TAKSIM / Istanbul
fields.description: Mask Live Music Club

fields.name: Olimpia Event Hall
fields.address: Istiklal Cad. Acara Sok. No: 2 ( next to the Yapi Kredi Kültür Merkezi)     GALATASARAY / Istanbul
fields.description: Located centrally in Galatasaray, Taksim, Hakan Küfündür's Olimpa organizes various party nights with themes ranging from 90s-parties to Gypsy music.
Hassan Khan will be in Istanbul on January 03, 2013.
fields.title: Hassan Khan in Istanbul

fields.description: The Istanbul Modern will be presenting an anthology of portrait photography from the Bank of America private collection.
fields.title: Gaze - Changing Face of Portrait Photography

fields.description: Better known as the lead singer of British Indie-Rock band Interpol, Paul Banks will be presenting his new solo project for two nights at Babylon.
fields.title: Paul Banks

fields.description: Lenny Kravitz is getting ready to give one of the most memorable concerts of this autumn in Istanbul.
fields.title: Lenny Kravitz in Istanbul

fields.description: SLASH Feat. Myles Kennedy & The Conspirators to perform at Kücükciftlik Park, Istanbul on February 2, 2012 Renowned as one of the best guitar players in Rock history, Slash will be performing in Istanbul on February 2nd 2012 with his new project.
fields.title: Slash Featuring Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators
fields.banner: events/Slash Featuring Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators/slash.jpg

fields.description: Due to the overwhelming demand stand up comedian Tolga Çevik is back on stage with his new show.
fields.title: Tolga Cevik Komedi Dukkani - Arkadasim Hosgeldin
fields.banner: events/Tolga Cevik Komedi Dukkani - Arkadasim Hosgeldin/tolgacevik_kd.jpg

fields.description: Depeche Mode
fields.title: Depeche Mode

fields.description: Russian-Canadian musician Chinawoman has a meeting with her fans on January 9 and 10 with the support of Radyo Eksen..
fields.title: Chinawoman

fields.description: Carrying 20s’ and 30s’ soul to the modern world, Tobumusikizm is inviting you to share the fun with its wide electro-swing records!
fields.title: Electro Swing Party

fields.description: All the way from Florida, the pop punk and alternative rock band Yellowcard will perform in Turkey for the first time at Babylon for two consecutive nights on 6th and 7th of February!
fields.title: Yellowcard

fields.description: Malt at Bronx Pi Sahne
fields.title: Malt

fields.description: GROOVE OLDIES PARTY  Canli Grup SOUL SENSATION
fields.title: Soul Sensation

fields.description: Gurcan Ersoy
fields.title: Gurcan Ersoy

fields.description: Flort
fields.title: Flort

fields.description: MxPx - Second - Dinamit
fields.title: MxPx - Second - Dinamit

fields.description: Iskender Paydas
fields.title: Iskender Paydas

fields.description: Özge
fields.title: Ozge

fields.description: Eski Bando
fields.title: Eski Bando

fields.description: Orient Expressions
fields.title: Orient Expressions

fields.description: Alex Metric
fields.title: Alex Metric

fields.description: Australian drum and bass master Pendulum who was the headline of many important festivals of the worl incluiding Glastonbury will be at Turkey for the first time. Get your tickets to join this concert now!
fields.title: Pendulum DJ Set + MC Verse

fields.description: Amy Winehouse Tribute
fields.title: Amy Winehouse Tribute

fields.description: Geveze & Zeliha Sunal : Neseli Masrapa
fields.title: Geveze & Zeliha Sunal : Neseli Masrapa
fields.banner: events/ Geveze & Zeliha Sunal : Neseli Masrapa/zeliha_geveze.jpg

fields.description: Cem Adrian
fields.title: Cem Adrian

fields.description: Rock band Gripin, started off together in 1999 playing mostly cover at bars not only included Britpop, but also featured examples of American Alternative rock. They had a considerably huge group of fans before they even released an album.
fields.title: Gripin

fields.description: Cheerful, alive and rhythmic…Get ready for a splendid musical journey with one of the world’s foremost jazz vocalists, Kurt Elling and Istanbul Superband, one of the the most privileged Big Bands of Turkey.
fields.title: Kurt Elling & Istanbul Superband

fields.description: Big Beats Big Times Vol.1
fields.title: Big Beats Big Times Vol.1
